questions.paragraph: What is the reason for humans' need to consume plants and animals?
Create three food chains from this group of organisms: (grass - mouse - snake - owl - rabbit - bird - grasshopper).
popup: First food chain: grass - grasshopper - bird
Second food chain: grass - mouse - owl
Third food chain: grass - rabbit - snake
The energy and nutrients won't be returned to the soil and the air, and the ecosystem will collapse.
The plants won't be able to produce their food, and all living organisms will eventually die.

questions.paragraph: The secondary consumers can't find the organisms they feed on?

popup: Life on Earth will be impossible.
